entry.title: FLASH FREEZE WARNING , Laurentides (Réserve faunique)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:22 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
